#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int i,j,k,t,n,l,c;
char p;
string s;
scanf("%d",&t);

while(t--)
{
cin>>s;
l=s.length();
c=0;
for(j=0;j<l;j++)
{
c+=s[j]-48;
if (c>=65&&c<=90||c>=97&&c<123) {printf("%c",c);c=0;}
else if (c==32) {printf(" ");c=0;}
else {c=c*10;}
}
printf("\n");
 
}
 
return 0;
}
